watchlater.title: The Cotton Club
watchlater.actors: Richard Gere, Gregory Hines, Diane Lane, Lonette McKee
watchlater.plot: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

favorite.title: Crocodile Dundee
favorite.actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil
favorite.plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

favorite.title: Ratatouille
favorite.actors: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy
favorite.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

movies.title: Beetlejuice
movies.actors: Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Annie McEnroe, Maurice Page
movies.plot: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a "bio-exorcist" in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.

movies.title: The Cotton Club
movies.actors: Richard Gere, Gregory Hines, Diane Lane, Lonette McKee
movies.plot: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Crocodile Dundee
movies.actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil
movies.plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

movies.title: Valkyrie
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson
movies.plot: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.actors: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy
movies.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

movies.title: City of God
movies.actors: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva
movies.plot: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

movies.title: Memento
movies.actors: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior
movies.plot: A man juggles searching for his wife's murderer and keeping his short-term memory loss from being an obstacle.

movies.title: The Intouchables
movies.actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
movies.plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies.title: Stardust
movies.actors: Ian McKellen, Bimbo Hart, Alastair MacIntosh, David Kelly
movies.plot: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

movies.title: Apocalypto
movies.actors: Rudy Youngblood, Dalia Hernández, Jonathan Brewer, Morris Birdyellowhead
movies.plot: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

movies.title: Taxi Driver
movies.actors: Diahnne Abbott, Frank Adu, Victor Argo, Gino Ardito
movies.plot: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson
movies.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies.title: Planet 51
movies.director: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad, Marcos Martínez
movies.actors: Jessica Biel, John Cleese, Gary Oldman, Dwayne Johnson
movies.plot: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

movies.title: Looper
movies.actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt, Paul Dano
movies.plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

movies.title: Corpse Bride
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson, Tracey Ullman
movies.plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

movies.title: The Third Man
movies.actors: Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli, Orson Welles, Trevor Howard
movies.plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

movies.title: The Beach
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon, Virginie Ledoyen
movies.plot: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.actors: Al Pacino, Steven Bauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
movies.plot: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

movies.title: Sid and Nancy
movies.actors: Gary Oldman, Chloe Webb, David Hayman, Debby Bishop
movies.plot: Morbid biographical story of Sid Vicious, bassist with British punk group the Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen. When the Sex Pistols break up after their fateful US tour, ...

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.actors: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel, Barbara Hershey
movies.plot: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

movies.title: Inception
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
movies.plot: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: The Deer Hunter
movies.actors: Robert De Niro, John Cazale, John Savage, Christopher Walken
movies.plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

movies.title: Chasing Amy
movies.actors: Ethan Suplee, Ben Affleck, Scott Mosier, Jason Lee
movies.plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's gay.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.actors: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
movies.plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.actors: Jodie Foster, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons, Lawrence T. Wrentz
movies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

movies.title: American Beauty
movies.actors: Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley
movies.plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

movies.title: Snatch
movies.actors: Benicio Del Toro, Dennis Farina, Vinnie Jones, Brad Pitt
movies.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies.title: Midnight Express
movies.actors: Brad Davis, Irene Miracle, Bo Hopkins, Paolo Bonacelli
movies.plot: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.actors: Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.actors: Natalie Portman, Hugo Weaving, Stephen Rea, Stephen Fry
movies.plot: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

movies.title: Gattaca
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Gore Vidal, Xander Berkeley
movies.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

movies.title: Silver Linings Playbook
movies.actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver
movies.plot: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Mia Wasikowska, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway
movies.plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

movies.title: Gandhi
movies.actors: Ben Kingsley, Candice Bergen, Edward Fox, John Gielgud
movies.plot: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

movies.title: Pacific Rim
movies.actors: Charlie Hunnam, Diego Klattenhoff, Idris Elba, Rinko Kikuchi
movies.plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

movies.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
movies.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Val Kilmer, Michelle Monaghan, Corbin Bernsen
movies.plot: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

movies.title: The Quiet American
movies.actors: Michael Caine, Brendan Fraser, Do Thi Hai Yen, Rade Serbedzija
movies.plot: An older British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

movies.title: Cloud Atlas
movies.director: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Jim Broadbent, Hugo Weaving
movies.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

movies.title: The Impossible
movies.actors: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland, Samuel Joslin
movies.plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

movies.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
movies.actors: Louis Wolheim, Lew Ayres, John Wray, Arnold Lucy
movies.plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

movies.title: The English Patient
movies.actors: Ralph Fiennes, Juliette Binoche, Willem Dafoe, Kristin Scott Thomas
movies.plot: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

movies.title: Dallas Buyers Club
movies.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner, Jared Leto, Denis O'Hare
movies.plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

movies.title: Frida
movies.actors: Salma Hayek, Mía Maestro, Alfred Molina, Antonio Banderas
movies.plot: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

movies.title: Before Sunrise
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Andrea Eckert, Hanno Pöschl
movies.plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

movies.title: The Rum Diary
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Rispoli, Amber Heard
movies.plot: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

movies.title: The Last Samurai
movies.actors: Ken Watanabe, Tom Cruise, William Atherton, Chad Lindberg
movies.plot: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

movies.title: Chinatown
movies.actors: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez
movies.plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption and murder.

movies.title: Calvary
movies.actors: Brendan Gleeson, Chris O'Dowd, Kelly Reilly, Aidan Gillen
movies.plot: After he is threatened during a confession, a good-natured priest must battle the dark forces closing in around him.

movies.title: Before Sunset
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Vernon Dobtcheff, Louise Lemoine Torrès
movies.plot: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.actors: Rumi Hiiragi, Miyu Irino, Mari Natsuki, Takashi Naitô
movies.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
